headline: Met Police officer 'could not walk straight' after visiting bar on duty
pitch: A uniformed police officer comically struggles to maintain composure and walk a straight line after a questionable "break" at a bar.

script.veo3_visual_prompt: A close-up of a grizzled, world-weary INTERNAL AFFAIRS INVESTIGATOR, mid-50s, tired eyes, dark suit, observing. His expression is a subtle mix of disbelief and resignation. In the background, out of focus, a DRUNK OFFICER in a slightly rumpled police uniform struggles to pick up a pen, swaying slightly. A CHIEF INSPECTOR, mid-40s, pristine uniform, tries to subtly steady the DRUNK OFFICER's arm. CAMERA: Static medium shot on INVESTIGATOR, subtle rack focus to background absurdity. STYLE: Harsh, institutional fluorescent lighting, cinematic, slightly desaturated colors. 9:16 vertical portrait aspect ratio
script.dialogue: Internal Affairs Investigator: (low, deadpan) The report states no impairment.
script.audio_cues: Distant, muffled police radio chatter. Gentle clinking of a pen hitting a table repeatedly.

script.veo3_visual_prompt: A medium shot, eye-level, of the DRUNK OFFICER, mid-30s, uniform now visibly disheveled, attempting to walk a straight line across a brightly lit, sterile police conference room. The DRUNK OFFICER dramatically veers left, then rights themself by grabbing a 'POLICE CODE OF CONDUCT' poster and nearly pulling it off the wall. The CHIEF INSPECTOR, standing beside the 'straight line' (a strip of hazard tape), forces a confident smile, arms crossed. The Internal Affairs Investigator is visible in the background, out of focus, slowly shaking his head. CAMERA: Tracking shot, handheld, following the DRUNK OFFICER's wobbly path. STYLE: Overly bright, clinical lighting, cinematic. 9:16 vertical portrait aspect ratio
script.dialogue: Chief Inspector: (strained cheerfulness) Perfectly linear, Investigator.
script.audio_cues: Loud, exaggerated 'thump' as poster is yanked. A small, involuntary hiccup from the Drunk Officer. The Investigator's almost imperceptible sigh.
